tag.description: Main entry point of ribbon component. InputDate is based on UIComponentBase Based on bootstrap-datetimepicker

attribute.description:
Closable

Closable allow to define if the menu desk can be closed !
attribute.name: closable

attribute.description:
Close Speed

Defined the speed on action close Default: 1000 ms
attribute.name: closeSpeed

attribute.description: Title label for closer element of closable panel.
attribute.name: closeTitle

attribute.description:
collapsable

Closable allow to define if the menu desk can be collapse !
attribute.name: collapsable

attribute.description: Renders a toggleable desk as collapsed. Default is false.
attribute.name: collapsed

attribute.description:
Collapse Speed

Defined the speed on action collapse Default: 1000 ms
attribute.name: collapseSpeed

attribute.description: Title label for collapse element of collapse menu.
attribute.name: collapseTitle

attribute.description:
Headered

Enable tite title bar panel which containt header title and collapser and closer button Default : true
attribute.name: headered

attribute.description:
Icon

Correspond to icon class Default : fa fa-navicon fa-2x
attribute.name: icon

attribute.description:
Menu

Menu refere and define the current defined menu
attribute.name: menu

attribute.description:
Navigator Titled

Enable the show or not of tooltip on navigator Default : true
attribute.name: navigatorTitled

attribute.description:
Navigator Title

Text to bein desplay when tooltip is request on navigator Default: Agrandir/Réduire
attribute.name: navigatorTitle

attribute.description: Style allow to specifie code css to be apply to component.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of main component
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Style class of item component
attribute.name: itemStyleClass

attribute.description: Style class of item header component
attribute.name: itemHeaderStyleClass

attribute.description: Style class of item content component
attribute.name: itemContentStyleClass

attribute.description: Makes panel toggleable. Default is false.
attribute.name: toggleable

attribute.description: Title attribute for toggler element of toggleable panel.
attribute.name: toggleTitle

attribute.description: Renders panel as hidden. Default is true.
attribute.name: visible

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

tag.description:
chart component

Define the chart markedup which allow to renderer a component chart.
The component chart can be define in two different ways :

  • One is to specify each attributes
  • The other is to give the chart model attribute
Note : When concurent attributes are define in specific attribute and in the chart model, the priority goes to the specific attribute.

The component chart is entierly base Highchart which will process chart rendering based on similar classes. http://api.highcharts.com/highcharts/

attribute.description: Convenient attribute only useful while programming. It allow to printout renderer mecanisme for the component. It has not effect on component while reducing processing time.
attribute.name: debug

attribute.description: Convenient property which enable to specify if the component has to load is own jQuery library or not. Default value is flase this means it is not loaded.
attribute.name: enabledJQuery

attribute.description:
Chart model attribute is based on a model definition which will be responsible of chart datas. It allow to design easily the chart in POJO and then renderer it definition.
Note : chart model has not priority to specific attribute : so carreful while using specify attribut in combination with model.
attribute.name: model

attribute.description: Deprecated : no effect on the component
attribute.name: responsive

attribute.description: Style property allow to directly insert css markeup to the current component which will override existing one.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: styleClass property allow to append your own class to the current component which will be associate to the existing one.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description:
Type indicate which kind of chart as to be renderer. It is a specific attribute thus grant priority to the chart model.
Possible value for chart are actually :

  • Line,
  • Pie,
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: Deprecated : not working
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: Zoom Type is one of x, y, xy which allow to perform zooming in x, y or both direction. If not defined no zoom is applied
attribute.name: zoomType

attribute.description: Get a string which uniquely identifies this UIComponent within the scope of the nearest ancestor NamingContainer component. The id is not necessarily unique across all components in the current view.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: A boolean value that indicates whether this component should be rendered. Default value: true.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Identifies a backing bean property (of type UIComponent or appropriate subclass) to bind to this component instance. This value must be an EL expression.
attribute.name: binding

tag.description: Fake allow only to load resource in order to develop.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: An icon for the current tab.
attribute.name: faIcon

attribute.description: Title text of the tab.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: Title container inner style.
attribute.name: titleStyle

attribute.description: Title container style class.
attribute.name: titleStyleClass

attribute.description: Disables tab element if true.
attribute.name: disabled

attribute.description: Makes the tab closable by displaying a close icon.
attribute.name: closable

attribute.description: Tooltip of the tab header.
attribute.name: titletip

tag.description:
InputCropper allows to select a picture. Depend on setup picture can be load in memory to be as a blob image.
The useful of crop is that image can be edited and cropped in différent way before being blob and return the blob link create.
InputCropper require "for" attribut that as to be lined to a input. Note : input will be laod inside the InputCropper html on ready DOM.

attribute.description: Alternate text of the image.
attribute.name: alt

attribute.description: Label of the apply button. Default value is "Appliquer". Write null if does not want a button apply.
attribute.name: applyLabel

attribute.description: Insert a title to the apply button. Default value is "Valider le redimensionnement". Write null if does not want a title on apply button.
attribute.name: applyTitle

attribute.description:
Define default aspect ratio which is one of :
  • "cinema" : [16:9]
  • "photo" : [4:3]
  • "camera" : [1:1]
  • "avatar" : [2:3]
  • "free" : any
attribute.name: aspectRatio

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Background color of the container.
attribute.name: backgroundColor

attribute.description: Background opacity of the container. Default is 0.6
attribute.name: backgroundOpacity

attribute.description: Maximum box height of the cropping area.
attribute.name: boxHeight

attribute.description: Maximum box width of the cropping area.
attribute.name: boxWidth

attribute.description: Invit label to choose a picture in browser button. Default value is "Charger".
attribute.name: chooseLabel

attribute.description: Display or not the close button on modal editor
attribute.name: closable

attribute.description: Hearder of the title bar in the modal window.
attribute.name: closeTitle

attribute.description:
Define the dragging mode of the cropper :
Default: 'crop'
Options:
  • 'crop': create a new crop box
  • 'move': move the canvas
  • 'none': do nothing
attribute.name: dragMode

attribute.description: Attribute "for" refer to an input text id where the it should present the result.
attribute.name: for

attribute.description: Header represent the title of modal window. Default value is "Title". Write null if does not want a title.
attribute.name: header

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Context relative path to the image
attribute.name: image

attribute.description: Initial coordinates of the cropper area.
attribute.name: initialCoords

attribute.description: Insert a title to input path image. Default value is "Cliquer pour modifier". Write null if does not want a title on avatar image.
attribute.name: inputTitle

attribute.description: Loading gif allow to change the current loading waiting. Default one exist
attribute.name: loadingGif

attribute.description: Minimum size of the cropper area.
attribute.name: minSize

attribute.description: Maximum size of the cropper area.
attribute.name: maxSize

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Rotation of the image
attribute.name: rotation

attribute.description: Upload Url define the servlet which manage the uplaod content
attribute.name: uploadUrl

attribute.description:
Zoom of the picture in both direction x, y
NB : prior is to zoomX and zoomY. Default value 1
attribute.name: zoom

attribute.description:
Zoom of the picture in X direction
NB : prior is on zoomX and not zoom. Default value 1
attribute.name: zoomX

attribute.description:
Zoom of the picture in Y direction
NB : prior is on zoomY and not zoom. Default value 1
attribute.name: zoomY

attribute.description: Value of the component.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: An el expression or a literal text that defines a converter for the component. When it's an EL expression, it's resolved to a converter instance. In case it's a static text, it must refer to a converter id.
attribute.name: converter

attribute.description: When set true, process validations logic is executed at apply request values phase for this component. Default is false.
attribute.name: immediate

attribute.description: Marks component as required.
attribute.name: required

attribute.description: A method expression referring to a method validationg the input.
attribute.name: validator

attribute.description: A method binding expression referring to a method for handling a valuchangeevent.
attribute.name: valueChangeListener

attribute.description: Message to display when required field validation fails.
attribute.name: requiredMessage

attribute.description: Message to display when conversion fails.
attribute.name: converterMessage

attribute.description: Message to display when validation fails.
attribute.name: validatorMessage

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

tag.description: OverlayPanel is a generic container component that is displayed as a popup.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: Inline style of the component.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of the component.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Identifier of the target component to show the panel.
attribute.name: for

attribute.description: Event to show the overlay panel, default is "click".
attribute.name: showEvent

attribute.description: Event to hide the overlay panel, default is "click".
attribute.name: hideEvent

attribute.description: Effect to display when showing the panel.
attribute.name: showEffect

attribute.description: Effect to display when hiding the panel.
attribute.name: hideEffect

attribute.description: When set true, panel is appended as a child of document body.
attribute.name: appendToBody

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when panel is displayed.
attribute.name: onShow

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when panel is hidden.
attribute.name: onHide

attribute.description: Position of the panel relative to the target.
attribute.name: my

attribute.description: Position of the target relative to the panel.
attribute.name: at

attribute.description: Dynamic mode allows overlay panel to fetch it's contents before it's shown rather than on page load which is useful to reduce initial page load times. Default is false.
attribute.name: dynamic

attribute.description: When set true, clicking outside of the panel hides the overlay.
attribute.name: dismissable

attribute.description: Displays a close icon to hide the overlay, default is false.
attribute.name: showCloseIcon

tag.description: Tab is a generic container component used by other PrimeFaces components such as tabView or accordionPanel.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: An icon for the current tab.
attribute.name: faIcon

attribute.description: Title text of the tab.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: Title container inner style.
attribute.name: titleStyle

attribute.description: Title container style class.
attribute.name: titleStyleClass

attribute.description: Disables tab element if true.
attribute.name: disabled

attribute.description: Makes the tab closable by displaying a close icon.
attribute.name: closable

attribute.description: Tooltip of the tab header.
attribute.name: titletip
